Articles.Content:
I saw a few days ago where there is a mod that allows you to copy parts into another rocket.

Example: I'm building a general use launch vehicle but don't want to have to rebuild a satellite, etc every time I decide to launch another, etc.

I'd like to be able to copy the satellite portion for use later.

Anyone remember what this mod is called? I've tried to find it again and can't seem to come across it.
It's called Subassembly Loader and Saver, but spaceport is down for maintenance right now so I can't get you a link
Thats fine I'll get it later since I got the name, thanks so much!
